metadata.title: CVE-2020-15701 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An unhandled exception in check_ignored() in apport/report.py can beexploited by a local attacker to cause a denial of service. If the mtimeattribute is a string value in apport-ignore.xml, it will trigger anunhandled exception, resulting in a crash. Fixed in 2.20.1-0ubuntu2.24,2.20.9-0ubuntu7.16, 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.6.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-15701` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

apport - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.6
apport-gtk - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.6
apport-kde - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.6
apport-noui - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.6
apport-retrace - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.6
apport-valgrind - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.6
dh-apport - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.6
python3-apport - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.6
python3-problem-report - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apport package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.20.11-0ubuntu27.6').
